channel.title: java on Van's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in java on Van's Blog

item.title: Java
item.description: How to run a packaged Java file from any folder Here is the structure of the Java project, were bin is the output folder demo ├─ src | └── com | ├── van | └── Demo.java ├─ bin To compile the Demo.java try the following command from the demo folder that will place the .class file in the package folders within bin folder $ javac -classpath ./src ./src/com/van/Demo.java -d ./bin
